definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: There is no mention of them in ancient Babylonian records.
sentences.chinese: 但在古巴比伦时期的记录中，却只字未提。

sentences.english: Another base is planned for the area that was ancient Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 另一个基地计划在古巴比伦地区。

sentences.english: An U.S. soldier looks over the ancient city of Babylon in Iraq in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 2004年一位美国士兵注视着伊拉克的古巴比伦城。

definition: Sumer (Šumer), one of the early civilizations of the Ancient Near East

pinyin: Mei3 suo3 bu4 da2 mi3 ya4
